projects.title: Create new homepage banner
projects.details: Design an eye-catching banner for the homepage featuring our new product launch. Must be responsive and include a call-to-action button.

projects.title: Make marketing email
projects.details: Create a promotional email campaign for Q4 sales. Include personalized greetings, product highlights, and discount codes.

projects.title: Design mobile app prototype
projects.details: Build interactive mockups for the iOS and Android app. Focus on user onboarding flow and main dashboard features.

projects.title: Update user documentation
projects.details: Revise the API documentation to reflect recent v2.0 changes. Add code examples and troubleshooting guides.

projects.title: Fix navigation menu bug
projects.details: Resolve the dropdown menu issue on mobile devices where submenus are not displaying correctly on iOS Safari.
